backend/main.mo: Actor imports blob storage mixin and defines a stub convertWordToPdf method.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI-related image resize fixes and associated source files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing layout, tools, SEO, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes for all tools and blog pages.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Simple ad placeholder component with size variants.
frontend/src/components/blog/blogPosts.t: Static list of blog post metadata including slugs, titles, and dates.
frontend/src/components/faq/ToolFaq.tsx: Reusable FAQ accordion component rendering question‑answer items.
frontend/src/components/home/BlogPreview: Home page section showing latest two blog posts with read‑more links.
frontend/src/components/home/Hero.tsx: Hero section with headline, description, and CTA button linking to merge‑pdf.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeFaq.tsx: Home page FAQ section using accordion with predefined questions.
frontend/src/components/home/toolsCatalo: Defines the Tool interface and exports a catalog of PDF, image, and conversion tools with metadata and icons.
frontend/src/components/home/ToolsGrid.t: Grid displaying all tools from TOOLS_CATALOG with start buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with tool links, trust notes, and a URL copy feature.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Implements the site navbar with navigation links, logo, mobile menu, and a 'Get Started' button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides the main page layout with navbar, ads, sidebar, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/seo/RelatedTools: Displays related tool links filtered from the tools catalog.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Applies SEO meta tags using the useSeoMeta hook.
frontend/src/components/tools/image/Imag: UI for choosing image resize parameters including mode, dimensions, percentage, target size, aspect ratio, and quality.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/ImageT: Config panel for selecting PDF page size, image fit mode, and margin when converting images to PDF.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Remove: Component for specifying page numbers or ranges to remove from a PDF.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Resize: Selector for choosing a target PDF page size for resizing operations.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Waterm: UI for configuring watermark text, style, position, opacity, size, and rotation.
Canvas-based live preview rendering the watermark according to current configuration.
frontend/src/components/tools/processors: Barrel file exporting PDF/Word conversion processors and related types.
Converts a PDF to a basic text-only Word document using pdf-lib and a CDN-loaded docx library, with progress tracking and size validation.
Empty placeholder file for Word-to-PDF related libraries.
Validates a Word file and converts it to PDF via a backend API, returning the output filename and blob with progress updates.
Resizes images based on pixels, percentage, or target size with validation, aspect ratio handling, and progress reporting.
Loads a PDF and adds text watermarks to each page using configurable font, position, opacity, and progress updates.
Compresses PDFs client-side with pdf-lib by re-saving with optimized options and tracks progress.
Creates a PDF from one or more images, supporting page size, fit mode, margins, and progress tracking.
Exports all PDF-related processors and types for merging, splitting, compressing, resizing, removing pages, watermarking, and image conversion.
Merges multiple PDFs by copying pages into a new document using pdf-lib with progress tracking.
Defines standard page sizes and provides a helper to retrieve their dimensions.
Deprecated backend PDF client that now only throws errors, kept for compatibility but unused.
Provides client-side PDF utilities, dynamically loading pdf-lib from CDN and offering helpers for page counting, file-size validation, progress updates, and ArrayBuffer reading.
Implements page removal from a PDF using pdf-lib, including input validation, progress reporting, and rebuilding a new PDF without specified pages.
Resizes PDF pages to a target size by scaling and centering content into new pages using pdf-lib with progress tracking.
Splits a PDF into individual pages, packages them into a ZIP using JSZip, and reports progress throughout processing.
frontend/src/components/tools/SelectedFi: Shows a list of selected files with file info and optional remove actions.
Defines a structured ToolError and utilities to normalize errors and generate user-friendly error messages for various tool scenarios.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolExperi: Manages the full tool workflow including upload, options, progress, errors, and result display.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolNextSt: Visual callout prompting the user to proceed to the next step.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPageSh: Wraps tool pages with a title, description, and structured layout.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPrimar: Styled primary action button supporting icons and loading state.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolResult: Shows the success UI and provides a button to download the processed file.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolSecond: Secondary action button with optional icon and variant styling.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolStepIn: Displays a three‑step progress indicator for tool workflows.
frontend/src/components/tools/UploadDrop: Drag-and-drop file selector with validation for types, sizes, and counts, passing chosen files upward.
frontend/src/components/trust/TrustNotes: Renders a UI section highlighting security, privacy, no-login use, and fast client-side processing.
frontend/src/config/toolLimits.ts: Contains file size limits and predefined user-friendly error messages for various tool constraints.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login state and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoMeta.ts: Hook that updates the document title and meta description tags based on provided values.
frontend/src/hooks/useToolJob.ts: Manages a tool job’s state including upload, processing, progress updates, completion, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, color variables, typography, and utility classes including prose and tool section styling.
frontend/src/lib/base64.ts: Utility functions for converting files to base64, base64 to Uint8Array, and base64 to Blob.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Provides a function to trigger mobile-friendly blob downloads via a temporary link.
frontend/src/lib/fileFormat.ts: Formats file sizes and derives human-readable file type labels from MIME types or extensions.
frontend/src/lib/wordToPdfApi.ts: Handles Word-to-PDF conversion by sending file bytes to the backend with progress updates and detailed error mapping.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogIndexPage.ts: Displays a list of blog posts with metadata, SEO info, and links to individual articles.
frontend/src/pages/blog/HowToCompressPdf: Renders a detailed guide article on compressing PDFs online with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/blog/ResizeImageUnder: Blog page explaining how to resize images under 50KB with steps, tips, and links to the resize tool.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page combining SEO setup with hero, tools grid, FAQ, and blog preview components.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AddWatermarkPag: Tool page allowing users to upload a PDF and apply customizable text watermarks using client-side processing.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CompressPdfPage: PDF compression tool that processes a single PDF in-browser and displays FAQs and related tools.
Converts multiple images to a single PDF with configurable page size and layout, using client-side processing.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MergePdfPage.ts: Merges multiple PDFs into one file in-browser, with FAQs and related tool links.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfToWordPage.t: Converts a PDF to a DOCX file using browser-based text extraction with basic formatting support.
frontend/src/pages/tools/RemovePagesPage: UI page for removing pages from a PDF, handling file selection, page-range parsing, processing, and job state management.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizeImagePage: Image resizing tool page with file validation, previews, dimension extraction, processing, and job result handling.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizePdfPage.t: PDF resizing page allowing users to select a target page size, run the resize processor, and manage job state.
frontend/src/pages/tools/SplitPdfPage.ts: Page for splitting a PDF into individual pages packaged as a ZIP, using the split processor and ToolExperience UI.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/INT: Documentation describing how the rebuilt Word‑to‑PDF module integrates into the app and listing modified and new components.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/Wor: Error display component showing conversion errors and a retry button.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/wor: Exports the FAQ list shown on the Word-to-PDF tool page.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/Wor: Progress UI card showing upload/convert status, file name, and progress bar.
Displays the successful conversion result with a download button and option to process another file.
Defines green/white theme classes and colors for the Word-to-PDF tool UI.
Main container managing Word-to-PDF upload, validation, conversion flow, progress, success, and error states.
Renders the upload/dropzone UI and selected-file preview with convert and remove actions.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/wor: Validates Word file type and size, returning structured errors for invalid inputs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/WordToPdfPage.t: Main Word‑to‑PDF conversion page using WordToPdfTool, with SEO, layout, FAQ, and ads integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, known issues, and active UI/UX fix requests for the image resize tool.
